text: Gumazir maba, Godɨn angazangarimɨn aven ikegha egha akurvazir aghuarir Godɨn Nguibamɨn izezim inigha ghaze, a bar dera, egha igharaz darazi ko, Godɨn Duam inis. Egha Godɨn akam baregha fo, a bar dera. Egha Godɨn gavgavimɨn aven ghua deragha an gani, gavgavir kamnagh dughiar aghuir gɨn izamimɨn a mɨsevegh azenimɨn otogham. Egh kamaghɨn amizir gumazim, akɨrim ragh God gasaragh man tuavitamɨn izɨva navim uam agɨragham? Bar puvatɨ. A kamaghɨn amua, mati a uan navir averiamɨn aven a Godɨn Otarim uam a isa ter ighuvim gafugha, a uam a gurazɨ gumaziba ua dɨbovibar a mɨgei. Kamaghɨn gumazir uan nɨghnɨzir gavgaviba ataghrazir kaba, me ua naviba giraghamin tuaviba puvatɨ.
